name: Lesser Erinyes
resistance: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The lesser erinyes has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Poisoned Weapons
traits.desc: The lesser erinyes’s weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 4 (1d8) poison damage on a hit (included in its attacks).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lesser erinyes makes three attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. The poison lasts until it is removed by the lesser restoration spell or similar magic.

actions.name: Parry
actions.desc: The lesser erinyes can add 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the lesser erinyes must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
